Text:
Man.. I have downloaded SOOOO many copies of this and BSPlayer. None have worked because either they were invalid packages, or the codec from the play store wouldn't work with them, and one wasn't included..

THIS WORKS PEOPLE!!
Does not work, This will work 3-4 times, then app will auto detect that it is not a paid version, and will stop abruptly with message "unable to verify licence"
